descriptionHtml:
Basically, this is my attempt to make a wider variety of texture chocies for the spriggan. 

INSTALLATION

Open the folder labeled with your choice.

Move all the files starting with \"spriggan\" into the actor texture folder of the same name. any that start with \"grad\" have to go into the effects texture folder, under the grad folder.


Note: This is unfinished, especially as far as autumn and winter. i may need help improving, so if you figue anything out, let me know. I will also update ASAP with a better version.
author: LatterofTheThree
